     WHERE record_num_desc = 1) papfb,po_headers_all poh,po_line_locations_all poll,po_lines_all pol,po_releases_all por,rcv_parameters rcv,po_vendor_contacts pvc,po_vendors pv,po_vendor_sites_all pvsa,

   AND (poll.org_id IN (?,?)) AND  ROWNUM <= 2 ) where row_number between 1 and 26 order by row_number
